app.file_manager module

class app.file_manager.FileManager[source]

Bases: object

A class to manage file operations for recordings, including creating the base directory and opening it for browsing.

BASE_DIR

The base directory path where recordings are stored.

Type:

str

BASE_DIR = 'C:\\STUDIA\\io-projekt\\io-projekt\\docs\\assets\\recordings'
browse_files()[source]

Opens the base directory in the system’s file explorer for browsing.

Main application class for recording online meetings.

get_selected_microphone()[source]

Retrieves the name of the currently selected microphone.

Returns:

The name of the selected microphone.

Return type:

str

open_settings()[source]

Opens the settings window where the user can adjust application settings such as FPS, language, and maximum file size.

select_microphone()[source]

Opens a window for selecting a microphone device from the available list.

start_recording()[source]

Starts the recording process using the recorder.

stop_recording()[source]

Stops the recording process and allows the user to save the file with a custom name.

app.recorder module

class app.recorder.Recorder(settings)[source]

Bases: object

A class for recording screen and audio simultaneously, with options to save and manage recordings.

BASE_DIR

Base directory for saving recordings.

Type:

str

app

Reference to the main application object, providing access to settings.

recording

Flag to indicate if recording is in progress.

Type:

bool

captured_video

VideoWriter object for saving screen recordings.

audio_thread

Thread for recording audio.

Type:

threading.Thread

video_thread

Thread for recording screen.

Type:

threading.Thread

PyAudio stream object for capturing microphone audio.

mic_audio_frames

Buffer for storing microphone audio frames.

Type:

list

File path for saving microphone audio.

Type:

stereo_audio_frames

Type:

BASE_DIR = 'C:\\STUDIA\\io-projekt\\io-projekt\\docs\\assets\\recordings'
merge_audio_video()[source]
start_recording()[source]

Starts recording screen and audio simultaneously. Creates necessary directories and initializes audio and video threads.

stop_recording(custom_name=None)[source]

Stops recording and saves the recorded files. Optionally renames the recording directory.

Parameters:

custom_name (str, optional) – Custom name for the recording directory.
